create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts, 40-60s high-retention philosophy rap
Primary request: Hook myth break: knowledge is the real flex.
Scene/background: neon rooftop with rapid motion graphics pulses, abstract and youth-centric
Subject: glowing glyphs, waveform rings, abstract silhouette forms
Action: 0-2s pattern interrupt with hard flash cuts; 2-8s glyph storm converges; 8-12s focus lock on bright center pulse
Camera: vertical 9:16, aggressive punch-ins every 2-3 seconds, dynamic orbit micro-moves
Lighting/mood: high-contrast neon with warm rim and haze
Color palette: cyan, amber, matte black, electric magenta
Style/format: contemporary trap visual language, cinematic, no text baked in
Audio: no internal vocals, this will be edited with external rap track
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker artifacts, text artifacts, jitter, watermarks
